resources.string: Are you intending to use sylval to aid your professional care business

With Sylval, your account is linked to a 'client, which is a person that needs care. This is most commonly a family member or loved one.

 Part of setting up your account requires you to create a 'sub' account for this person or persons in order to request care appointments on their behalf.

 Don't worry, it's quick and easy to set up, and we'll show you how it works when you're finished. First, we'll need some basic information from you.
We\'ve verified your email address!\n\nNow, please supply the following information to finish setting up your account
I am happy to exchange care for someone who would provide care for my loved one
Care for a person loved one?
Last step, we promise.\n\nPlease enter the information of the person or persons that require care.
